# Misc·进阶区

## 1、base64÷4

![image-20201130082729032](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/image-20201130082729032.png)

根据名称，推测为base16

下载附件，为txt文档，如下图所示。

![image-20201130083601474](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/image-20201130083601474.png)

在线base16解码

![image-20201130083706648](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/image-20201130083706648.png)

得到flag

```text
flag{E33B7FD8A3B841CA9699EDDBA24B60AA}
```

## 2、wireshark-1

![image-20201130083817579](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/image-20201130083817579.png)

由题知，本体为数据包分析

下载附件

![image-20201130083934079](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/image-20201130083934079.png)

用wireshark打开

![image-20201130084024614](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/image-20201130084024614.png)

追踪tcp流

![image-20201130084127415](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/image-20201130084127415.png)

找到flag

```text
flag{ffb7567a1d4f4abdffdb54e022f8facd}
```

## 3、reverseMe

![image-20201130084413801](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/image-20201130084413801.png)

下载附件，得到一张图片

![image-20201130084502220](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/image-20201130084502220.png)

由题知，大概反转就是flag。

使用win10自带的图片编辑器就可以完成反转，效果如下

![image-20201130084816126](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/image-20201130084816126.png)

得到flag

```text
flag{4f7548f93c7bef1dc6a0542cf04e796e}
```

## 4、Aesop\_secret

![image-20201130090157234](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/image-20201130090157234.png)

下载附件，如下

![Aesop](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/Aesop.gif)

猜测是将每一帧拼起来

使用Photoshop最终得到

![Aesop1](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/Aesop1.png)

本以为就此结束，flag是ISCC，但是不对

将原图用winhex打开，发现文件尾部有如下可疑的编码

![image-20201130090617720](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/image-20201130090617720.png)

初步判断，应该是base64

复制出去解码

![image-20201130090937049](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/image-20201130090937049.png)

解码失败

结合题目，以及之前拼图获得的ISCC，推测为aes加密，

尝试解码，key为ISCC

![image-20201130091250504](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/image-20201130091250504.png)

解码获得一串短一点的字符串，推测为二次aes加密，继续解密

![image-20201130091428833](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/image-20201130091428833.png)

得到flag

```text
flag{DugUpADiamondADeepDarkMine}
```

## 5、a\_good\_idea

![image-20201130092439634](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/image-20201130092439634.png)

下载附件，为一个图片，如下

![a\_very\_good\_idea](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/a_very_good_idea.jpg)

使用winhex查看，发现如下

![image-20201130092605420](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/image-20201130092605420.png)

文件尾部有压缩包，怀疑是隐藏文件、

使用foremost分解

得到一个隐藏的压缩包

![image-20201130092704278](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/image-20201130092704278.png)

解压后得到两张图片和一个txt

![image-20201130092906215](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/image-20201130092906215.png)

文档内部显示

![image-20201130092941617](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/image-20201130092941617.png)

让我们从像素中寻找秘密

用Stegsolve拼合图片，发现显示很奇怪，效果如下

![image-20201130093949240](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/image-20201130093949240.png)

用ps调整参数

将曝光度调整到最高，得到一张二维码

![image-20201130094135935](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/image-20201130094135935.png)

使用QR Research扫描

![image-20201130094327967](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/image-20201130094327967.png)

得到flag

```text
NCTF{m1sc_1s_very_funny!!!}
```

## 6、can\_has\_stdio?

![image-20201130094449560](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/image-20201130094449560.png)

附件解压后得到一个无后缀文件，如下

![image-20201130094612009](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/image-20201130094612009.png)

使用010打开后，内部显示如下

![image-20201130094700860](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/image-20201130094700860.png)

经过查询得知该编码是BrainFuck编码

[BrainFuck介绍](https://www.jianshu.com/p/f72ea736e994)

[在线解码](http://ctf.ssleye.com/brain.html)

![image-20201130100738108](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/image-20201130100738108.png)

得到flag

```text
flag{esolangs_for_fun_and_profit}
```

## 7、János-the-Ripper

![image-20201130101043507](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/image-20201130101043507.png)

附件解压后获得

![image-20201130103423192](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/image-20201130103423192.png)

使用010打开查看，显示如下：

![image-20201130103508788](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/image-20201130103508788.png)

根据文件头判断应该是个zip压缩包，并且其中有flag.txt文件

更改文件后缀为zip

![image-20201130103604701](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/image-20201130103604701.png)

尝试解压，发现需要密码

![image-20201130103647971](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/image-20201130103647971.png)

怀疑伪加密

尝试修改，失败

使用zipperello暴力破解

![image-20201130104240350](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/image-20201130104240350.png)

爆出解压密码为fish

解压文件

![image-20201130104354297](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/image-20201130104354297.png)

得到flag

```text
flag{ev3n::y0u::bru7us?!}
```

## 8、快乐游戏题

![image-20201130105159581](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/image-20201130105159581.png)

下载附件提示报毒，于是在专用测试软件的虚拟中下载运行

![image-20201130105442648](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/image-20201130105442648.png)

玩个游戏直接通关就给flag

![image-20201130105044443](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/image-20201130105044443.png)_\*_

有点简单

```text
UNCTF{c783910550de39816d1de0f103b0ae32}
```

## 9、Banmabanma

![image-20201130110853652](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/image-20201130110853652.png)

附件下载，解压后是应该png图片

![&#x6591;&#x9A6C;&#x6591;&#x9A6C;](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/%E6%96%91%E9%A9%AC%E6%96%91%E9%A9%AC.png)

一眼看去，确认是条形码

尝试用手机扫码，尝试无果

使用在线解码网站，解码成功，显示如下

![image-20201130111035914](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/image-20201130111035914.png)

得到flag

```text
flag{TENSHINE}
```

## 10、stage1

![image-20201130120808569](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/image-20201130120808569.png)

附件下载，是个图片

![3600c13125fe4443aeef3c55b9c1357b](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/3600c13125fe4443aeef3c55b9c1357b.png)

拉入stegsolve

发现有二维码

![image-20201130122143441](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/image-20201130122143441.png)

使用QR Research扫描后得到

![image-20201130122423873](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/image-20201130122423873.png)

初步断定该字符串为十六进制数，放入在线解码

![image-20201130122601206](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/image-20201130122601206.png)

解码出来的推测为.pyc文件，将原16进制字符串通过winhex保存为.pyc文件，效果如下：

![image-20201130122819671](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/image-20201130122819671.png)

进行反编译

![image-20201130122846849](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/image-20201130122846849.png)

运行即可出现flag

![image-20201130123504109](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/image-20201130123504109.png)

得到flag

```text
AlphaLab
```

## 11、Hear-with-your-Eyes

![image-20201130134127726](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/image-20201130134127726.png)

附件为一段音频，如下

![image-20201130134220992](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/image-20201130134220992.png)

拖入Audacity进行分析

![image-20201130134309839](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/image-20201130134309839.png)

更改显示为频谱图

![image-20201130134403803](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/image-20201130134403803.png)

显示如下

![image-20201130134432976](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/image-20201130134432976.png)

得到flag

```text
flag{e5353bb7b57578bd4da1c898a8e2d767}
```

## 12、再见李华

![image-20201130140012186](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/image-20201130140012186.png)

附件解压后获得一张图片

![mail2LiHua](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/mail2LiHua.jpg)

直观上的感觉是MD5

尝试解密

![image-20201130143717384](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/image-20201130143717384.png)

解密无果

winhex查看该图片，发现图片中有一个key.txt

![image-20201130144510567](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/image-20201130144510567.png)

使用foremost分解

分离出一个压缩包，内含一个加密txt文件

![image-20201130144737999](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/image-20201130144737999.png)

推测密码与题目有关，且密码尾部为LiHua

爆破,使用ARCHPR进行暴力破解，选择掩码，推测LiHua前应该有四位密码\(根据1000是四位联想到\)，勾选大写、小写字母及数字

![image-20201201141621708](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/image-20201201141621708.png)

开始爆破！

![image-20201201141657538](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/image-20201201141657538.png)

成功得到解压密码

```text
15CCLiHua
```

解压文件，得到flag

![image-20201201141828927](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/image-20201201141828927.png)

```text
Stay hungry, Stay foolish.
```

顺带一提，前面给的MD5值是这个解压密码MD5加密后的前16位，或许应该爆破。

## 13、something\_in\_image

![image-20201201142300310](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/image-20201201142300310.png)

附件下载下来是一个没有后缀的文件

![image-20201201143640992](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/image-20201201143640992.png)

用winhex打开，搜索flag

![image-20201201143705039](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/image-20201201143705039.png)

得到flag

```text
Flag{yc4pl0fvjs2k1t7T}
```

## 14、simple\_transfer

![image-20201201143856706](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/image-20201201143856706.png)

附件是一个数据包文件

![image-20201201144119840](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/image-20201201144119840.png)

winhex分析后发现其中有pdf文件

![image-20201201150521889](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/image-20201201150521889.png)

使用foremost分离，获得pdf文件

![image-20201201150631860](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/image-20201201150631860.png)

打开后显示图像数据不充分

![image-20201201150709845](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/image-20201201150709845.png)

里面是一片空白，实际上是由一张显示不出来的图片挡住了flag

![image-20201201150855016](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/image-20201201150855016.png)

得到flag

```text
HITB{b3d0e380e9c39352c667307d010775ca}
```

## 15、适合作为桌面

![image-20201202093717222](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/image-20201202093717222.png)

附件下载是一张图片

![1](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/1.png)

跟上方stage1的附件一样，推测解法差不多

拉入stegsolve

发现有二维码

![image-20201202093922751](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/image-20201202093922751.png)

使用QR Research扫描二维码

![image-20201202094000226](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/image-20201202094000226.png)

得到一串十六进制数

粘入winhex

![image-20201202094107259](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/image-20201202094107259.png)

保存为.pyc文件

![image-20201202094050271](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/image-20201202094050271.png)

反编译

![image-20201202094140079](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/image-20201202094140079.png)

稍稍修改，运行

![image-20201202094313901](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/image-20201202094313901.png)

得到flag

```text
flag{38a57032085441e7}
```

## 16、神奇的Modbus

![image-20201202133043854](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/image-20201202133043854.png)

附件是一个数据包

使用wireshark打开，并搜索flag、key、ctf等关键字

在搜索ctf时出现flag

![image-20201202133213928](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/image-20201202133213928.png)

得到flag，格式为sctf{}且中间要补上一个o

```text
sctf{Easy_Modbus}
```

## 17、MISCall

![image-20201202133538651](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/image-20201202133538651.png)

附件下载是一个没有后缀的文件

![image-20201202133604779](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/image-20201202133604779.png)

使用winhex打开

![image-20201202133808630](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/image-20201202133808630.png)

看不出来是什么文件

使用文件格式分析器分析一波

![image-20201202133840397](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/image-20201202133840397.png)

发现是.BZC压缩文件，更改后缀

使用bandzip解压

发现flag.txt

![image-20201202134139067](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/image-20201202134139067.png)

打开查看

![image-20201202134158155](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/image-20201202134158155.png)

提示没有东西，继续前进。。。

发现.git文件夹内部也没有flag

网上查询后得知本题考察 .git目录利用、git stash命令

将此文件夹拖入kali

![image-20201202140112710](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/image-20201202140112710.png)

查看提交的commit history

```text
git log
```

![image-20201202140141745](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/image-20201202140141745.png)

查看堆栈中的 stash 列表

```text
git stash list
```

![image-20201202140238633](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/image-20201202140238633.png)

显示文件

```text
git stash show
```

![image-20201202140312053](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/image-20201202140312053.png)

重新进行储存 复原文件得到s.py文件

```text
git stash apply
```

![image-20201202140349576](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/image-20201202140349576.png)

运行s.py文件

```text
python s.py
```

![image-20201202140415030](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/image-20201202140415030.png)

得到flag

```text
NCN4dd992213ae6b76f27d7340f0dde1222888df4d3
```

## 18、Reverse-it

![image-20201202142242672](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/image-20201202142242672.png)

附件为一个无后缀的文件

使用winhex打开后看不出来是啥

同时使用binwalk等文件分析器也分析不出来文件格式

根据题意

怀疑文件的十六进制源码需要逆转

恰好文件头和文件为逆转后欸话jpg格式一样

```text
str_1 = ' '

str_2 = str_1[::-1]

print(str_2)
```

使用脚本逆转

粘贴进新文件，保存为jpg

![image-20201202144227945](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/image-20201202144227945.png)

保存成功

![image-20201202144245339](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/image-20201202144245339.png)

发现图片还要反转

![ausdghaiou](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/ausdghaiou.jpg)

本想使用win10自带编辑器，进行反转，结果文件太小，不支持

![image-20201202144604435](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/image-20201202144604435.png)

随后使用ps进行反转，得到flag

![image-20201202144537035](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/image-20201202144537035.png)

```text
SECCON{6in_tex7}
```

## 19、打野

![image-20201203084240584](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/image-20201203084240584.png)

使用winhex查看

![image-20201203084439440](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/image-20201203084439440.png)

无果

使用文件分析器分析

![image-20201203084520203](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/image-20201203084520203.png)

是分析为bmp

使用binwalk分析

![image-20201203084641877](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/image-20201203084641877.png)

还是bmp

使用zsteg查看是否有隐写数据

![image-20201203084753474](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/image-20201203084753474.png)

得到flag

```text
qwxf{you_say_chick_beautiful?}
```

## 20、倒立屋

![image-20201203091301477](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/image-20201203091301477.png)

使用winhex查看

![image-20201203091339856](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/image-20201203091339856.png)

无果

使用binwalk和分拣分析器均无果

尝试stegsolve

![image-20201203091448425](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/image-20201203091448425.png)

同样无果

使用zsteg查看文件

![image-20201203091520887](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/image-20201203091520887.png)

发现疑似flag

```text
IsCc_2019
```

多次提交后无果

网上查询后得知，flag提交要结合题目翻转。。。。。。

```text
flag{9102_cCsI}
```

## 21、2017\_Dating\_in\_Singapore

![image-20201203101308091](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/image-20201203101308091.png)

下载附件为一个日历

![image-20201203101345125](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/image-20201203101345125.png)

将之前的题目描述保存到记事本中

使用`-`明显就是分割符

手动处理一下

![image-20201203101750874](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/image-20201203101750874.png)

一共十二行，对应12个月

![daliy](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/daliy.png)

得到flag

```text
HITB{CTFFUN}
```

## 22、Erik-Baleog-and-Olaf

## 23、Ditf

![image-20201203111958440](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/image-20201203111958440.png)

附件解压是一个png图片

使用binwalk题区出一个rar加密压缩包

![image-20201203112124617](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/image-20201203112124617.png)

![image-20201203112152106](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/image-20201203112152106.png)

尝试暴力破解失败

继续从图片上寻找线索

使用一系列隐写查看工具过了一遍均无所获

最后尝试使用winhex修改图片高度

![image-20201203112454115](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/image-20201203112454115.png)

得到解压密码

![image-20201203112414574](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/image-20201203112414574.png)

解压压缩包得到一个pcapng数据包文件

![image-20201203112617144](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/image-20201203112617144.png)

先于http中搜索各种关键字

在搜索png时，找到一个kiss.png的记录，其中有一段可以代码

![image-20201203113453015](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/image-20201203113453015.png)

尝试将字符串base64解码

![image-20201203113535137](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/image-20201203113535137.png)

得到flag

```text
flag{Oz_4nd_Hir0_lov3_For3ver}
```

## 25、就在其中

![image-20201228091711433](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/image-20201228091711433.png)

附件解压后得到一个数据包

![image-20201228091753268](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/image-20201228091753268.png)

拉入winhex分析

可以看到它似乎是传输某些文档的流量包，推测flag与传输的文档有关

追踪tcp流，发现有个类似传输文件目录的东西，其中的.key文件需要重视，含flag文档很有可能是需要解密。

![image-20201228091954744](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/image-20201228091954744.png)

发现私钥

![image-20201228091914673](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/image-20201228091914673.png)

之后还在里面发现了一个压缩包文件以及pdf文件的ascii码，但是都复原不了

使用binwalk扫一遍

![image-20201228092707410](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/image-20201228092707410.png)

提取出来很多奇奇怪怪的东西

其中有一个key.txt文件

![image-20201228092823332](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/image-20201228092823332.png)

打开显示乱码

![image-20201228092919100](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/image-20201228092919100.png)

推测使用先前获得的私钥解密

先将之前的私钥保存为test.key

再使用openssl

```text
openssl rsautl -decrypt -in key.txt -inkey test.key -out flag.txt
```

其中 -in 为要解密的加密文档 -inkey 为密钥 -out 为输出文档

![image-20201228093232333](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/image-20201228093232333.png)

打开flag.txt

![image-20201228093308385](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/image-20201228093308385.png)

得到flag

```text
flag{haPPy_Use_0penSsI}
```

## 26、Miscellaneous-200

![image-20201228162720481](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/image-20201228162720481.png)

附件是一个文档

![image-20201228162810950](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/image-20201228162810950.png)

推测是像素点

导入PIL库，使用脚本

```text
from ast import literal_eval as make_tuple
from PIL import Image

f = open('flag.txt', 'r')
corl = [make_tuple(line) for line in f.readlines()]
f.close()
img0 = Image.new('RGB', (270, 270), '#ffffff')
k = 0
for i in range(246):
    for j in range(246):
        img0.putpixel([i, j], corl[k])
        k = k + 1
img0.save("result.png")
```

生成图片

![image-20201228162923953](https://gitee.com/YiGaoyu/pic_repo/raw/master/image-20201228162923953.png)

得到flag

```text
flag{ youc@n'tseeme }
```

## 27、
